  • Class
    Description
    BatchInternal
    Internal implementation for OpenGL batch management that gives OpenGL (& OpenGL ES) - based BatchRenderBackend implementations some default functionality to avoid having to reinvent the wheel and to prevent unnecessary code duplication.
    BatchRenderBackendInternal
    Internal BatchRenderBackend implementation for OpenGL batch rendering that provides OpenGL (& OpenGL ES) - based BatchRenderBackend implementations some default functionality to avoid having to reinvent the wheel and to prevent unnecessary code duplication.
    BatchRenderConfiguration
     
    BatchRenderDevice
    BatchRenderDevice will try to reduce state changes by storing as many textures as possible into texture atlases, and will try to render the whole GUI in as few draw calls as possible.
    BatchRenderFont
     
    BatchRenderImage
     
    BatchRenderImage.TextureSize
     
    CheckGL
    Helper class to check for OpenGL errors.
    GLException
    This is the exception thrown by classes that make OpenGL calls, in case something goes wrong badly.
    TextureAtlasGenerator
    This class tries to fit source texture data into a single destination texture.
    TextureAtlasGenerator.Result
    You'll get an instance of this class back when you add an image.
